owner.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

repo.description: The name of the repository without the `.git` extension. The name is not case sensitive.

issue_number.description: The number that identifies the issue.

sub_issue_id.description: The id of the sub-issue to add. The sub-issue must belong to the same repository owner as the parent issue

replace_parent.description: Option that, when true, instructs the operation to replace the sub-issues current parent issue
